Title: Office 4.3
Feature_1: This is the last 16-bit version. This means that it is also the last version to support Windows 3.x, Windows NT 3.1

Title: Office 95 (7.0)
Feature_1: Coincided with the Windows 95 operating system release.
Feature_2: Works only on Windows 95 as well as Windows NT 3.51 and later. This is the first Office version to have the same version number

Title: Office 97 (8.0)
Other Components: Outlook, Access, BookShelf Basics, Publisher 97, Publisher 98, Small Business Financial Manager 97, Small Business Financial Manager 98, Automap Street Plus, Direct Mail Manager, Expedia Streets 98
Feature_1: Was published on CD-ROM as well as on a set of 45 3Î_-inch floppy disks
Feature_3: was the last version to support Windows NT 3.51.

Title: Office 97 Powered by Word 98 (8.5)
Other Components: Outlook, Access, BookShelf Basics, Publisher 97, Publisher 98, Small Business Financial Manager 97, Small Business Financial Manager 98, Automap Street Plus, Direct Mail Manager, Expedia Streets 98
Feature_1: Was released only in Japanese and Korean editions
Feature_2: First version to contain Outlook 98 in all editions and Publisher 98 in the Small Business Edition,
Feature_3: the first version of Office 97 to support Windows 98 Second Edition.

Title: Office 2000 (9.0)
Other Components: Outlook, Publisher, Small Business Tools, Access, FrontPage, PhotoDraw
Feature_1: First Version to Support Windows XP, Windows Server 2003 and last version to support Windows 95.
Feature_2: Office 2000 is also the last version not to include Product Activation and not covered by Office Genuine Advantage, although on individual installs, the Office Update website still required the presence of original install media for updates to install.

Title: Office XP (10.0)
Other Components: Outlook, Access, Publisher, FrontPage, Small Business Tools
Feature_1: Last version to support Windows 98, Windows ME and Windows NT 4.0.
Feature_2: Improved support for working in user accounts without administrative privileges on Windows 2000 and Windows XP.

Title: Office 2003 (11.0)
Feature_1: First version to introduce Windows XP style icons.
Feature_3: Last version to have legacy menus.

Title: Office 2007 (12.0)
Other Components: Outlook, Publisher, Access, InfoPath, Communicator, Groove, OneNote, Visio Viewer, OCT
Feature_2: First version to use the new Ribbon user interface with tabbed menus.

Title: Office 2010 (14.0)
Other Components: OneNote, Outlook, Publisher, Access, InfoPath, SharePoint Workspace, Visio Viewer, OCT, Lync
Feature_1: This is the first version to ship in 32-bit and 64-bit.
Feature_2: Last version to support Windows XP, Windows Server 2003 and Windows Vista.
Feature_3: Version 13.0 was skipped because of the fear of the number 13.

Title: Office 2013 (15.0)
Other Components: OneNote, Outlook, Publisher, Access, Lync, Skype for Business, Visio Viewer
Feature_1: Lync is replaced with Skype for Business after an update.

Title: Office 2016 (16.0)
Other Components: OneNote, Outlook, Publisher, Access, Skype for Business, Visio Viewer
Feature_1: Last version to support Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2008 and Windows Server 2012.
